item.title: Amazon Adds SiriusXM to Programmatic Sales Offer
item.description: After securing many big deals to help it sell a wide array of programmatic ads against top video, Amazon is now working to do the same with audio. Amazon unveiled an alliance Tuesday with SiriusXM Med

item.description: After securing many big deals to help it sell a wide array of programmatic ads against top video, Amazon is now working to do the same with audio. Amazon unveiled an alliance Tuesday with SiriusXM Med

item.title: Former ‘DWTS’ Pro Peta Murgatroyd Debuts New Podcast ‘The Penthouse With Peta’ (Exclusive)
item.description: With season 34 of ‘DWTS’ quickly approaching, Murgatroyd will recap episodes of the beloved competition series with fellow professional dancers during a segment of the series each week.

item.title: You’ve Never Heard of Alt-Comedy’s Favorite Writer (He Wants It That Way)
item.description: Mike Sacks’ bizarre books and podcasts have drawn a cult following among celebrities from Jon Hamm to Bob Odenkirk. And if you don’t know his name, well, that’s entirely his fault.

item.title: You’ve Never Heard of Alt-Comedy’s Favorite Writer (He Wants It That Way)
item.description: Mike Sacks’ bizarre books and podcasts have drawn a cult following among celebrities from Jon Hamm to Bob Odenkirk. And if you don’t know his name, well, that’s entirely his fault.

item.title: ‘Diary of a CEO’ Host Steven Bartlett Is Not Willing to Risk His Happiness
item.description: The multihyphenate behind the popular podcast wants to show the reality — positives, negatives and all — to creating success and satisfaction in life.

item.description: Plus: Their biggest challenges, the most overrated trends in the industry and their fears for the future.

item.title: Are Top Podcasters Fudging Their Numbers?
item.description: Why podcast metrics can’t be trusted: “I can’t believe how many people are dishonest about this stuff.”

item.title: The 44 Most Powerful Players in Podcasting in 2025
item.description: Whether they’re behind the mic or behind the scenes, these trailblazers are steering the maturing medium through an increasingly crowded landscape and critical transitions to video and AI.

item.title: 10 Essential Episodes of ‘WTF With Marc Maron’
item.description: Sure, the podcast trailblazer interviewed Obama — but there are plenty more highlights among the 1600+ episodes he’s logged over 16 years.

item.title: Who the F*** Is Marc Maron Without Podcasting? He’s About to Find Out
item.description: Sixteen years after his show launched an industry and saved his career, the curmudgeonly conversationalist is feeling conflicted about what followed: “Things were better before everyone had a voice.”

item.title: Craig Mazin, John August to Release ‘Scriptnotes’ Book Based on Hit Podcast (Exclusive)
item.description: For the book, August and Mazin drew on hours of Scriptnotes conversations, as well as their own storied careers, to help readers begin, refine and sell their own scripts.
